name: The Crate Escape (DeathByAutoscroll, timoreo)
description:
You have found yourself trapped in a galaxal dimension. Armed with only a gun that can turn monsters into crates and the ability to shrink you must escape!

WASD - Move character
ARROW KEYS - Shoot in direction
X - Shrink/Grow
Y - Drop crate

Do you have the strength to escape this short adventure? Find out now!

Credits:
Timoreo: All the coding - https://itch.io/profile/timoreo
DeathByAutoscroll: Artist

Requirements:
Requires Java to run the .jar, and software to unzip the zip file but otherwise not much else ;)

Made for Flo's July 21st gamejam: [https://itch.io/jam/21st-july-flo-game-jam]
